text: "Jagged Edge of a Broken Heart" is a 1984 song by country singer Gail Davies. It was taken from her studio album Where Is a Woman to Go. It went to number 20 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles and Tracks chart and number 38 on the Canadian RPM Country Songs chart. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Country songs Category:Gail Davies songs
title: Jagged Edge of a Broken Heart
